name: Collared
description:
Collared is a pixel art puzzle platformer about a canine thief with a cursed collar that gives her the ability to manipulate reality. Play through levels by rotating the world to make pathways to your goal. Grapple with more complex puzzles as you go, dealing with immovable blocks, power supplies, and more.

The game currently has 15 training levels, and 45 full game levels to play. These are split into 5-level sets, so if you get stuck on any, you can keep playing by moving to a different set.
